Package uk.ac.uea.framework

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Audio
    An interface class used to load sounds from external sources
    FileIO
    An interface class used to read and write files
    Image
    An interface class used to deal with an image.
    Input
    An interface class used to deal with use input.
    Login
    An interface class used to log a user on an application.
    Logout
    An interface class used to log a user out of an application.
    ObserverClient<T>
    Implementation of the Observer Design Pattern.
    Register
    An interface which can be implemented to register a user on the system by providing various properties.
    Sound
    An interface class used to handle sound.
    TouchHandler
    An interface class used to handle touch.

    ParsingStrategy
    Abstract class which implements the Strategy Design Pattern.
